alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Macon; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 11:19PM CST until March 06 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Piatt County in central Illinois... Southeastern De Witt County in central Illinois... Macon County in central Illinois... * Until midnight CST. * At 1118 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Warrensburg, or 8 miles west of Decatur, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Decatur and Forsyth around 1125 PM CST. Maroa and Oreana around 1130 PM CST. Argenta around 1135 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Weldon, Monticello and De Land. This includes the following highways... Interstate 72 between mile markers 128 and 169. Interstate 74 near mile marker 160. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
